# Presentation Ace
# Executive presentation design and PowerPoint retainer support.

## Primary pages
- https://presentationace.com/
- https://presentationace.com/services
- https://presentationace.com/pricing
- https://presentationace.com/portfolio
- https://presentationace.com/about
- https://presentationace.com/contact

## What I do
- Executive presentation design (PowerPoint-first)
- Ongoing retainer support (reserved capacity and priority turnaround)
- Redesign and reformatting to brand
- Story/structure support (optional)
- Data visualization cleanup
- Purposeful animation
- Presentation engineering (navigation and interactive builds, scoped when complex)

## Notes
- Client work is often confidential; portfolio examples may be anonymized or shared with permission.
- Contact: ace@presentationace.com
